Chinas V-shaped economic rebound from the Covid-19 pandemic is slowing, sending a warning to the rest of world about how durable their own recoveries will prove to be.

articles.title: Banks told to prep IT systems for possibility of negative rates - iTnews
articles.description: By the end of April 2022.
articles.content:
Australia’s banks have been directed to prepare their IT systems to deal with the prospect of zero or negative interest rates by the end of April next year.
